newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK's Jackin IPO seen 250 times subscribed - sources.
newsitem.headline: HK's Jackin IPO seen 250 times subscribed - sources.

text.p: The initial public offering (IPO) of shares of Jackin International Holdings Ltd is expected to be 250 times subscribed, market sources said at the close of the IPO on Wednesday.
An official statement on the subscription results will be released on November 25 and dealing in the shares is expected to begin on November 28.
Jackin offered 90.75 million shares, comprising 74.25 million new shares and 16.5 million existing shares, at HK$1.05 per share in the Hong Kong flotation.
Jackin engages in manufacturing, replication and sale of content-based and blank information storage media products, including CD-ROMs, VCDs, CDs, CD cleaners and floppy disks.
